A1-B1.rationale: Both points discuss the limitations and modest performance of the models in question. Review A focuses on the low precision of models in out-of-distribution settings, while Review B highlights the limited accuracy (~50%) even with controlled variables, questioning the utility of fact extraction.

A3-B3.rationale: Both points express concerns about unclear experimental details which affect reproducibility. Review A notes vaguely described training sample details, while Review B emphasizes confusion about data usage and calls for precise descriptions and data release.
